entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow or rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023
